    Description

  • Classes in com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial used by com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial
    Class
    Description
    ClippingStrategy
    Strategy for handling Z clipping decisions in spatial pipelines.
    DepthAwareBatchConsumer
    Buffering consumer that optionally sorts chunks by depth before forwarding.
    Matrix4x4
    4x4 transformation matrix for spatial projection.
    OrthographicProjector
    Orthographic projector: depth does not affect scale.
    PerspectiveProjector
    Perspective projector: scales by depth (z).
    SpatialBuffer
    Reusable coordinate buffers for spatial projections.
    SpatialChunkConsumer
    Consumer for spatial buffer chunks.
    SpatialDataMapper
    Zero-allocation mapper for streaming model data into spatial buffers.
    SpatialDataMapper.ZMode
    Z-value selection strategy for 2D series.
    SpatialDepthPolicy
    Strategy for ordering spatial chunks by depth.
    SpatialDepthPolicy.Mode
     
    SpatialPathBatch
    Zero-allocation batch container for projected 2D path coordinates.
    SpatialPathBatchBuilder
    Builds render-ready path batches from spatial buffers with clipping transitions.
    SpatialPathBatchBuilder.ClippingMode
     
    SpatialPeakMetadata
    Captures peak anchors detected during spatial optimization.
    SpatialPeakProvider
    Exposes spatial peak metadata for accessibility or logging purposes.
    SpatialProjector
    Projects 3D coordinates into a 2D space representation.
    SpatialScratchBuffer
    Scratch buffers for SIMD paths (no allocations in hot loops).
    SpatialStyleDescriptor
    Packed style descriptor for spatial batch rendering.
    Vector3D
    3D vector container for spatial projection.
    VectorizedHitDetector
    SIMD-aware hit detector for spatial buffers.
    VectorizedSpatialOptimizer
    SIMD-aware optimizer for spatial buffers.
    VectorizedSpatialOptimizer.DepthDampingMode
     
    ZComponentProvider
    Pluggable Z-component provider for spatial mapping.
